module.name: document_definition
module.keywords: module module, document definition, physical document definition, digital document definition

purpose.p: The Document definition application module supports the requirement to represent a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using different formats.

inscope.li: The definition of a document version in a digital format such as an electronic file;
The definition of a document version in a non-digital format such as an electronic file paper copy.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of (digital or physical) document definition.

description.p: The Document_Definition UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of representing a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using different formats.
